# $Id: makefile.defs 1107 2007-04-16 23:59:13Z rvernica $

# Date: 03/25/2007
# Author: Rares Vernica <rvernica@ics.uci.edu>

DEFS = -DSIM_DIST=1 -DSIM_VECT=1 -DDATASET_LEN=20 -DQ_GRAM=2

CC = g++
CPPFLAGS = -Wall -I$(TRUNK_PATH) -I$(SEPIA_PATH) $(DEFS) -O3 # -g
